participant_1.background:
I am a responsible adult who works hard and takes care of my responsibilities.
i have two kids i enjoy being on social media.
My job is flexible, so I can take care of my health and still be productive.
i hate my parents , but i love my job.
i love owning nice office supplies.

participant_2.background:
My cupcake business keeps me busy, but I also enjoy hiking and biking in my new home state of Florida.
I remember pretending to be a dragon trainer with my siblings at the park and getting lost in our imagination.
i am a childrens librarian.
I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia.
but , i feel lost and far away from who i truly am.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I am a childrens librarian. I love my job!
That sounds awesome! I love kids.
Me too! I remember when I was a kid I would pretend to be a dragon trainer at the park with my siblings.
That is so cute! I used to pretend to be a princess.
I love to hike and bike in my new home state of Florida. Do you like to be active?
Yes, I do! I love to go for walks with my kids.
That's great! Being active is important for your health.
Yes, it is. I also like to work out at the gym.
That's great! I have been working on my car in the garage. I am dreaming of going to Australia.
That sounds like fun! I have always wanted to go to Australia.
Maybe we can go together sometime.
